banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: What if we traded employees like football players?
videoData.socialTitle: What if we traded employees like football players?

nodes.whoTheyAre: Yusuf Nurbhai is the Chief Administrative Officer for Global Markets in EMEA, responsible for administrative management and coordination of deliverables to global leaders. His career at State Street ranges from research to foreign exchange.

videoData.description: What would happen if new companies hired, fired, and managed in the same way as football clubs? What if new employers "bought" their new hires, and paid old employers a fee, à la Cristiano Ronaldo? In this short talk, Yusuf contemplates the consequence of playing the old corporate game by new rules.
videoData.socialDescription: What would happen if new companies hired, fired, and managed in the same way as football clubs? What if new employers "bought" their new hires, and paid old employers a fee, à la Cristiano Ronaldo? In this short talk, Yusuf contemplates the consequence of playing the old corporate game by new rules.
